body: Finally nailed a #kickflip! Been practicing for weeks. Check it out! #skateboarding #tricks

comments.body: Nice! That looked super clean! How long did it take you to get it down?
@56565 Thanks! It took me about a month of solid practice. There were a lot of falls along the way!
Dude, that was smooth! What’s next, learning to ollie up curbs?
@67676 Haha, that’s exactly what I’m working on next! Got to get more comfortable riding over obstacles.
You make it look easy! I’ve been trying to learn kickflips for ages. Any tips?
@78787 Don’t give up! It’s all about foot placement and committing to the flip. Took me forever to get the timing right!
Sick! Where did you learn how to skate? You’ve got some serious skills!
@89898 Thanks! Mostly self-taught, but I watch a lot of tutorials online. YouTube has been a lifesaver!
Kickflip king right here! Are you planning to hit the skatepark soon?
@90909 Haha, for sure! I’m going this weekend to test it out on some ramps. Should be fun!
